text: Martin Vlach (born 2 May 1997) is a Czech modern pentathlete. He participated at the 2018 World Modern Pentathlon Championships, winning a medal.Relay results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Czech male modern pentathletes Category:World Modern Pentathlon Championships medalists Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics
title: Martin Vlach (pentathlete)
